message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you get a decent chunk.
My turn for a fair offer, Alice.  Let's split the difference so we both benefit before inflation eats away at the value.
Let's be reasonable.  I'll take a smaller share this time, but we both still get a decent amount before the value drops further.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  We're both losing out because of inflation.  Meet me halfway - this is my final offer.
